text: <a href="../1-Chronicles-1-1/" title="1 Chronicles 1:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 Adam, Sheth, Enosh,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-2/" title="1 Chronicles 1:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 Kenan, Mahalaleel, Jered,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-3/" title="1 Chronicles 1:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 Henoch, Methuselah, Lamech,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-4/" title="1 Chronicles 1:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-5/" title="1 Chronicles 1:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 The sons of Japheth; Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-6/" title="1 Chronicles 1:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 And the sons of Gomer; Ashchenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-7/" title="1 Chronicles 1:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 And the sons of Javan; Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-8/" title="1 Chronicles 1:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 The sons of Ham; Cush, and Mizraim, Put, and Canaan.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-9/" title="1 Chronicles 1:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 And the sons of Cush; Seba, and Havilah, and Sabta, and Raamah, and Sabtecha. And the sons of Raamah; Sheba, and Dedan.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-10/" title="1 Chronicles 1:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 And Cush begat Nimrod: he began to be mighty upon the earth.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-11/" title="1 Chronicles 1:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 And Mizraim begat Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-12/" title="1 Chronicles 1:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 And Pathrusim, and Casluhim, (of whom came the Philistines,) and Caphthorim.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-13/" title="1 Chronicles 1:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 And Canaan begat Zidon his firstborn, and Heth,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-14/" title="1 Chronicles 1:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 The Jebusite also, and the Amorite, and the Girgashite,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-15/" title="1 Chronicles 1:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 And the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-16/" title="1 Chronicles 1:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16 And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-17/" title="1 Chronicles 1:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17 The sons of Shem; Elam, and Asshur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram, and Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Meshech.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-18/" title="1 Chronicles 1:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18 And Arphaxad begat Shelah, and Shelah begat Eber.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-19/" title="1 Chronicles 1:19 KJV verse detail"><span id="21" class="versehover">19 And unto Eber were born two sons: the name of the one *was* Peleg; because in his days the earth was divided: and his brother's name *was* Joktan.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-20/" title="1 Chronicles 1:20 KJV verse detail"><span id="22" class="versehover">20 And Joktan begat Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-21/" title="1 Chronicles 1:21 KJV verse detail"><span id="23" class="versehover">21 Hadoram also, and Uzal, and Diklah,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-22/" title="1 Chronicles 1:22 KJV verse detail"><span id="24" class="versehover">22 And Ebal, and Abimael, and Sheba,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-23/" title="1 Chronicles 1:23 KJV verse detail"><span id="25" class="versehover">23 And Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab. All these *were* the sons of Joktan.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-24/" title="1 Chronicles 1:24 KJV verse detail"><span id="26" class="versehover">24 Shem, Arphaxad, Shelah,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-25/" title="1 Chronicles 1:25 KJV verse detail"><span id="27" class="versehover">25 Eber, Peleg, Reu,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-26/" title="1 Chronicles 1:26 KJV verse detail"><span id="28" class="versehover">26 Serug, Nahor, Terah,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-27/" title="1 Chronicles 1:27 KJV verse detail"><span id="29" class="versehover">27 Abram; the same *is* Abraham.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-28/" title="1 Chronicles 1:28 KJV verse detail"><span id="30" class="versehover">28 The sons of Abraham; Isaac, and Ishmael.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-29/" title="1 Chronicles 1:29 KJV verse detail"><span id="31" class="versehover">29 These *are* their generations: The firstborn of Ishmael, Nebaioth; then Kedar, and Adbeel, and Mibsam,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-30/" title="1 Chronicles 1:30 KJV verse detail"><span id="32" class="versehover">30 Mishma, and Dumah, Massa, Hadad, and Tema,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-31/" title="1 Chronicles 1:31 KJV verse detail"><span id="33" class="versehover">31 Jetur, Naphish, and Kedemah. These are the sons of Ishmael.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-32/" title="1 Chronicles 1:32 KJV verse detail"><span id="34" class="versehover">32 Now the sons of Keturah, Abraham's concubine: she bare Zimran, and Jokshan, and Medan, and Midian, and Ishbak, and Shuah. And the sons of Jokshan; Sheba, and Dedan.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-33/" title="1 Chronicles 1:33 KJV verse detail"><span id="35" class="versehover">33 And the sons of Midian; Ephah, and Epher, and Henoch, and Abida, and Eldaah. All these *are* the sons of Keturah.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-34/" title="1 Chronicles 1:34 KJV verse detail"><span id="36" class="versehover">34 And Abraham begat Isaac. The sons of Isaac; Esau and Israel.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-35/" title="1 Chronicles 1:35 KJV verse detail"><span id="37" class="versehover">35 The sons of Esau; Eliphaz, Reuel, and Jeush, and Jaalam, and Korah.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-36/" title="1 Chronicles 1:36 KJV verse detail"><span id="38" class="versehover">36 The sons of Eliphaz; Teman, and Omar, Zephi, and Gatam, Kenaz, and Timna, and Amalek.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-37/" title="1 Chronicles 1:37 KJV verse detail"><span id="39" class="versehover">37 The sons of Reuel; Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-38/" title="1 Chronicles 1:38 KJV verse detail"><span id="40" class="versehover">38 And the sons of Seir; Lotan, and Shobal, and Zibeon, and Anah, and Dishon, and Ezer, and Dishan.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-39/" title="1 Chronicles 1:39 KJV verse detail"><span id="41" class="versehover">39 And the sons of Lotan; Hori, and Homam: and Timna *was* Lotan's sister.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-40/" title="1 Chronicles 1:40 KJV verse detail"><span id="42" class="versehover">40 The sons of Shobal; Alian, and Manahath, and Ebal, Shephi, and Onam. And the sons of Zibeon; Aiah, and Anah.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-41/" title="1 Chronicles 1:41 KJV verse detail"><span id="43" class="versehover">41 The sons of Anah; Dishon. And the sons of Dishon; Amram, and Eshban, and Ithran, and Cheran.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-42/" title="1 Chronicles 1:42 KJV verse detail"><span id="44" class="versehover">42 The sons of Ezer; Bilhan, and Zavan, *and* Jakan. The sons of Dishan; Uz, and Aran.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-43/" title="1 Chronicles 1:43 KJV verse detail"><span id="45" class="versehover">43 Now these *are* the kings that reigned in the land of Edom before *any* king reigned over the children of Israel; Bela the son of Beor: and the name of his city *was* Dinhabah.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-44/" title="1 Chronicles 1:44 KJV verse detail"><span id="46" class="versehover">44 And when Bela was dead, Jobab the son of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in his stead.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-45/" title="1 Chronicles 1:45 KJV verse detail"><span id="47" class="versehover">45 And when Jobab was dead, Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in his stead.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-46/" title="1 Chronicles 1:46 KJV verse detail"><span id="48" class="versehover">46 And when Husham was dead, Hadad the son of Bedad, which smote Midian in the field of Moab, reigned in his stead: and the name of his city *was* Avith.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-47/" title="1 Chronicles 1:47 KJV verse detail"><span id="49" class="versehover">47 And when Hadad was dead, Samlah of Masrekah reigned in his stead.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-48/" title="1 Chronicles 1:48 KJV verse detail"><span id="50" class="versehover">48 And when Samlah was dead, Shaul of Rehoboth by the river reigned in his stead.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-49/" title="1 Chronicles 1:49 KJV verse detail"><span id="51" class="versehover">49 And when Shaul was dead, Baalhanan the son of Achbor reigned in his stead.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-50/" title="1 Chronicles 1:50 KJV verse detail"><span id="52" class="versehover">50 And when Baalhanan was dead, Hadad reigned in his stead: and the name of his city *was* Pai; and his wife's name *was* Mehetabel, the daughter of Matred, the daughter of Mezahab.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-51/" title="1 Chronicles 1:51 KJV verse detail"><span id="53" class="versehover">51 Hadad died also. And the dukes of Edom were; duke Timnah, duke Aliah, duke Jetheth,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-52/" title="1 Chronicles 1:52 KJV verse detail"><span id="54" class="versehover">52 Duke Aholibamah, duke Elah, duke Pinon,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-53/" title="1 Chronicles 1:53 KJV verse detail"><span id="55" class="versehover">53 Duke Kenaz, duke Teman, duke Mibzar,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-54/" title="1 Chronicles 1:54 KJV verse detail"><span id="56" class="versehover">54 Duke Magdiel, duke Iram. These *are* the dukes of Edom.
